# PCMBayes

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.com/venelin/PCMBayes.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/venelin/PCMBayes)
<!-- badges: end -->

PCMBayes provides Bayesian inference for multivariate phylogenetic comparative mehtods. 

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("venelin/PCMBayes")
```
